attributes.action: retain the national heritage symbol of Bitannia on the 50p piece
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned would like to remind the Prime Minister that his incumbency is temporary and that the history of the British people is a matter of legacy.  We would also like to inform the Prime Minister that, by thinking change reflects the modern cultural diversity of Britain, he is distancing himself from the core of the British people and those who will effectively decide his political future.  And he has not, as yet, employed, imported nor bought sufficient of the electorate to ensure his office at the next election, which not even he can put off forever.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
